text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
The earlier race was excellent. Everyone should 
recognize you as one of the strongest now. 
How about being a little proud of yourself?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
No……not yet. I want to prove that the 
blood flowing through me is the 『Strongest』

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I see your enthusiasm hasn't changed much since your school 
days. I suppose that's just a part of you, Duramente.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You're going to train some more after this, right? 
Since it's been a while, how about some parallel running?

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text: ……! However, aren't you really busy……?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Not so much that I can't afford to spend some time 
with my esteemed disciple. Let's just go get changed. 
You want as much time to run as possible, right?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I may not be like my mother, but I still want to prove I can be 
a role model for you. Don't hesitate to rely on me, Dura.

text_block_list.name: Duramente
text_block_list.text:
Groo-nee……there's no way you aren't like Teacher. 
Your presence is always huge. The same as always.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, it's senpai! Listen to this～. I had another late start…… 
Though, if I don't make a mistake I win!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text:
Me too, in the end, my last push just wasn't enough…… 
a nose, it was just by a nose! It's so frustrating!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I get it, I get it. I'll take a look at your running too. So that 
things work out next time, we'll formulate some countermeasures.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Waaa……today too, she's surrounded by so many. It's amazing……
choice_data_list: Cesario, you admire Air Groove too?
Cesario, you admire Air Groove too?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes. To see her putting in so much effort to help her 
kouhai like that, that makes her a great role model to me.

That made sense to me. Air Groove also ran in 
the Tiara rotation, an Uma Musume that achieved 
spectacular success, including winning the 『Oaks』

She also acts as the Student Council Vice President so I've 
seen her speaking on stage several times. On the school 
grounds, she always seemed to be surrounded by people.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
A great athlete doesn't necessarily become a 
great instructor. But……the admiration that comes 
from being a great athelete is definitely a plus.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Air Groove became a second generation winner at 
the 『Oaks』. From mother to child, that run was 
inherited. It kind of gives credence to that.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
And that, on campus, she's always surrounded by so many 
because she can provide the kind of guidance they need.
choice_data_list: You want to become like that, right?
You want to become like that, right?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. To be earnest and sincere to everyone. In 
that way, passing on that run to someone, crossing 
generations, from one to the next, and the next.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Even if that dream is just a small one, when all 
of those dreams come together, they become one big 
dream. I think that……is a really wonderful thing!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That's the kind of grand dream that I'm willing 
to devote my life to, to see it realized.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
The girl that I raise to race, that her 
successor will also leave a mark――

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Just as the streams in the shadows of mountains become 
rivers and flow in to the ocean. They connect, and 
grow, and carry these feelings beyond the horizon.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
I want to be part of the foundation for the future. Even as 
this body reaches adulthood……and even as it begins to wither.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That is……to become 『A guiding light for future Uma Musume』―― 
what I'm willing to spend a lifetime to accomplish.
I could feel my heart pounding in my chest again.

Crossing generations, the inheritance of an Uma 
Musume. Connecting the past to the future, as 
if flowing downstream in to a distant ocean.

The sheer scale of it made my head spin. 
Cesario was looking far beyond the present, in to the future.

"As a squash is before ’tis a peascod, or a codling 
when ’tis almost an apple"――How could one not be 
overwhelmed by the prospects of a girl like her?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Yes, I am aware it's an amazing dream.

She had mentioned many times that she wanted to win the 
Triple Tiara, especially the 『Oaks』 to prove her worth.

Rather than for a leader, this was the first step to 
become a 『Guiding Light』. In order to realize that, 
she would need to take strong and steady steps forward.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
It's as you say. 
That's why……I want to carefully choose my trainer.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
It won't be enough just to guide me to prove my worth in races. 
For my dream――I need someone who will accompany me the entire way.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
If I had to put it to words, a 『Partner』, someone to walk 
this path together throughout life. Someone that makes me 
believe they will be that person, is who I want as my trainer.

Even after parting ways with Cesario, 
my heart was still beating loudly.

The sun was setting behind the buildings, 
night was approaching from the east. In to 
that night, I wish I could toss aside this longing.
choice_data_list: (But here, it was as bright as midday)

text_block_list.text:
……But, now wasn't the time to be feeling like a character in 
a play. I needed to think about what I could do for Cesario.

What was the essence of a 『Partner』? What kind of 
person should the trainer standing next to Cesario be?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …………Dura, your growth is quite remarkable……

As I slowly gazed down in to the courtyard, Air Groove 
appeared. The appearance of an unexpected character 
seemed like providence, turning tragedy to comedy.
choice_data_list: If it's her……then she might know!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You're……the trainer that was together with Cesario. 
What do you need that has you so out of breath?
choice_data_list: As Cesario's predecessor, I wanted your opinion

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Cesario's predecessor? Me?
choice_data_list: You might know what Cesario is thinking
You might know what Cesario is thinking

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
…………sounds like you've got some circumstances. Got it. 
For now, I'll listen to what you have to say.
